name: Ajwa Kalakand

instructions.action: Blend the dates with milk to a smooth paste
Heat ghee in a pan, add the date paste and cook for 2-3 minutes
Add milk powder, cardamom powder and salt
Mix well and cook until the mixture thickens and leaves the sides of the pan
Transfer to a greased plate and spread evenly
Let it cool and cut into desired shapes
Garnish with chopped nuts if desired

tips: Use pitted dates for easier blending
Cook on medium heat to prevent burning
The mixture should be thick enough to hold shape when cooled
